skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Sendaii-class ship No. 2, Flagship of the Second Torpedo Squadron, Jintsuu. People have criticized me for being a coward, but I proved myself in the Battle of Kolombangara. Let me show you the glory of the Second Torpedo Squadron once more.
skins.acquisition: The battlefield can change at any second. Think rationally and act cautiously so that you may never be defeated in battle. Commander, have you been able to achieve this? Flagship of the Second Torpedo Squadron, Jintsuu, reporting for duty.
skins.login: Commander, how you spend your time off-duty is no business of mine. Once you arrive, however, please do your work properly.
skins.details: For the next operation, we need to allocate resources, and... Yes? Ah, help yourself, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: If being cautious is considered cowardice, then shouldn't being brave also be considered recklessness?
skins.secretaryIdle2: There is no single solution for everything. Only through comparison, practice, and even failure, can one find their own correct answer.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even if others don't understand my actions, I'll always do what I think is right... Even if you don't understand, Commander.
skins.secretaryTouch: What's the matter? I'm just thinking about how to manage the fleet.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You've got more guts than I expected, Commander. Do you have the heart to face the consequences, though?

skins.shipDescription: Since I've gotten used to living with you, Commander, I've decided to be more laid-back after receiving my remodel. My dance? Hehe... I can't show that to just anyone so easily.
skins.acquisition: Since I've gotten used to living with you, Commander, I've decided to be more laid-back after receiving my remodel. My dance? Hehe... I can't show that to just anyone so easily.
skins.login: Did you sleep well, Commander? Do you need any help with fleet administration?
skins.details: Commander, do you have any tactics you'd like to discuss with me? If you'd like... we can also just sit down and have a chat.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sometimes it's hard to prove to others that what you believe is right. Commander, let's do our best together!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Every now and then, I get a bit jealous of Sendai and how straightforward she is...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even though some people may think that cautiousness is a sign of weakness, I'll be happy as long as our fleet truly understands me...
skins.secretaryTouch: There's nothing wrong with wanting to see me dance... I'll show you, but only if you work seriously first!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, please do not mistake my cautiousness for tolerance.

skins.shipDescription: Hmm? Is it unusual? Hah. Even I require a change of pace to clear my mind every so often. Commander, why don't you come out and get some fresh air as well?
skins.acquisition: Hmm? Is it unusual? Hah. Even I require a change of pace to clear my mind every so often. Commander, why don't you come out and get some fresh air as well?
skins.login: After we finish work today, how about taking a break on the beach?
skins.details: I said I was taking a vacation, but even out here on the beach, I'm still thinking about the affairs of the fleet... I really am a workaholic, aren't I?
skins.secretaryIdle1: If you relax too much, you'll become undisciplined. If you're too uptight, you'll only find yourself out of breath.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Every year when it is swimsuit season, I can't help but to be envious of Sendai... Commander, I'm not being negligent in my exercise, am I?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, your mind has wandered off onto the beach, hasn't it? It’s written all over your face.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you're concerned about it too, right? My tail is so conspicuous in this swimsuit...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You can't concentrate on your work when I'm wearing a swimsuit, right? Hehe, just consider this a test of will then.
